subject: Re: [junit] Programming By Contract
msgSnippet: ... Once more with feeling and correctness: Assertion failures should *never* be caught. Meyer is right on this. Regards, Rob
messageBody:
--- Robert Sartin <sartin@...> wrote:
>Assertion failures should be caught. Meyer is right on this.

Once more with feeling and correctness:

Assertion failures should *never* be caught. Meyer is right on this.

Regards,

Rob
